com.madrobot.ui.widgets

Class JoystickView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.madrobot.ui.widgets.JoystickView

  • public class JoystickView
extends View
    Joystick view. Behaves just an analog joystick.

    Requires the vibrate permission to be set (android.permission.VIBRATE).

    The following are the JoystickView attributes (attrs.xml)

    Attribute Type Default Description
    bgColor Color 0xff888888 (Gray) The background color of the joystick
    bgAlpha Integer 255 Transparency of the joystick background
    handleColor Color 0xff444444 (Dark Gray) Joystick handle color
    clickThreshold float 0.4f (should be from 0 to 1) Pressure for which an event should be considered as a click
    moveResolution float 1.0f Number of pixels movement required between reporting to the listener
    autoReturnToCenter boolean true Return the joystick handle to the center after release.
    coordinateSystem cartesian
    differential    		 cartesian Coordinate System the user prefers
    yAxisInverted boolean true Use inverted Y axis
    vibrate boolean false Vibrate on click and released events
    vibrateDuration integer 300 duration to vibrate

    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent

      • setClickThreshold

        public void setClickThreshold(float clickThreshold)
        Set the pressure sensitivity for registering a click
        Parameters:
        clickThreshold - threshold 0...1.0f inclusive. 0 will cause clicks to never be reported, 1.0 is a very hard click
